definitions.definition: A litter to transport the corpse of a dead person.
A platform or stand where a body or coffin is placed.
A count of forty threads in the warp or chain of woollen cloth.

main_definition: A litter to transport the corpse of a dead person.
secondary_definitions: A platform or stand where a body or coffin is placed.
A count of forty threads in the warp or chain of woollen cloth.
